titleStmt.title: A letter from Dr. P. to the Bishop of R--- in vindication of his sermon on Trinity Sunday.
titleStmt.author: Payne, William, 1650-1696.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to William Payne.
The Bishop of R---- is Thomas Sprat--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
23 additional pages in Greek and Latin.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
